# LokaLingo

> AI-powered language learning and teaching platform. Built for independent educators — Canvas whiteboard system captures real conversations, AI generates assessments, and spaced repetition drives retention. Flat $6/seat pricing with no commissions.

- [For Learners](https://lokalingo.com/en/for-learners): 5-dimension AI progress tracking, spaced repetition, CEFR alignment
- [For Schools](https://lokalingo.com/en/for-schools): Multi-teacher management, institutional licensing
- [Use Cases](https://lokalingo.com/en/use-cases): Real-world teaching scenarios
